data.quote: I hope that I serve by being a teacher.
data.author: Jenna Bush

data.quote: As a teacher you can see the difference in kids who have parents who were involved. That difference, by the time these kids get to the third grade, is drastic.
data.author: Jenna Bush

data.quote: I never wore a tie voluntarily, even though I was forced to wear one for photos when I was young and for official events at school. I used to wrap my tie in a newspaper, and whenever the teacher checked I would quickly put it on again. I'm not used to it. Most Bolivians don't wear ties.
data.author: Evo Morales

data.quote: If you lock me in the room with a piano teacher for a year I might be able to knock out a rendition of 'Roll Out The Barrel,' but will I ever be a concert pianist? No.
data.author: Alan Sugar

data.quote: I like to be at a party and be a quiet observer, be in conversation. I wouldn't say I was a class clown growing up, but I would definitely sit back in class and take snipes at the teacher.
data.author: Eric Stonestreet

data.quote: I was a hyperactive kid, and it took awhile for me to find the right teacher. My master was a Shaolin kung fu teacher, but he also taught tai chi, Chinese medicine, brush painting - he was adept at all facets of Chinese culture.
data.author: Daniel Wu

data.quote: As a teacher I realize that what one learns in school doesn't serve for very much at all, that the only thing one can really learn is self-understanding, and this is something that can't be taught.
data.author: Laura Esquivel

data.quote: I remember telling my creative writing teacher that you never want to have a journal, because if you lose it, then someone's going to know all your secrets. And then she stopped using a journal, but I always write everything down... Anytime I travel, I try and fill up notepads.
data.author: Garrett Hedlund

data.quote: I had a public school education - 3,000 kids when I was there. And there were a lot of teachers who would just sit there. You'd come in and sign your name and the teacher would just sit there at the head of the class and you would literally just have to stay in your seat for 40 minutes and that was the only thing you'd have to do in class.
data.author: Casey Affleck

data.quote: My folks were busy. My dad was a teacher, and it was during the Second World War, and my mother was working. So I got my stories from films and books. I read a lot, and I love to read to this day.
data.author: Robert Osborne

data.quote: Of course, MIT was notable not just for its faculty but also for its students. And, facing such extremely bright kids as a rookie teacher was something like being thrown to the wolves.
data.author: Eric Maskin

data.quote: My parents were not affluent people and were not - didn't come from the extremities of education. My mother had a high school diploma. I often think I so wish she'd come out of the hills in Appalachia and been able to go on to college. I think she would have made a wonderful teacher.
data.author: Dwight Yoakam

data.quote: When I was in junior high, a foreign-history teacher started a theater class. So I got my feet wet there and through high school, so I was very fascinated with acting as a means of expression.
data.author: Dwight Yoakam

data.quote: Over my life as a teacher, women have been too quiet. I'm quiet myself. I don't think I said three words the whole of graduate school.
data.author: Marilynne Robinson

data.quote: When I was in college, I had the good fortune to have Joyce Carol Oates as my writing teacher. She told me that I could take an aspect of myself, and from that one bit of personality, I can create a character. This is what I have done, particularly in my novels.
data.author: Jonathan Ames

data.quote: My dance teacher will show me pictures of girls who are rhythmic gymnasts, and they are super skinny. But I don't want to be too skinny. I think that looks a little gross when you are dancing. You don't want to be a scrawny, bony thing.
data.author: Maddie Ziegler

data.quote: I often think that the prime directive for me as a teacher of writing is akin to that for a physician, which is this: do no harm.
data.author: Chang-Rae Lee

data.quote: I tell my son Corey that the greatest teacher is the teacher who says, 'Don't follow me; follow yourself. Because within you there is that kingdom, that life, that force.'
data.author: Billy Dee Williams

data.quote: I made my drama teacher cry. I only took drama to get out of writing papers in English and the teacher was this thespian Broadway geek and here I was this Italian guy from Staten Island and I would put her in tears.
data.author: Vinny Guadagnino

data.quote: If you love dance and you have the gift of teaching, teaching is super amazing and important because my teachers planted that seed in me. As a teacher you understand the difference or the definition of a Baryshnikov or a Gregory Hines, so teaching is really important and very necessary.
data.author: Laurieann Gibson

data.quote: I'm just not a natural teacher.
data.author: David Benioff

data.quote: I had gone to New York with no plan at all. I did a lot of jobs - barman, teacher, security guard, postman and construction worker - and I was meeting many eccentric characters, and they were saying funny things, which I always wrote down.
data.author: Adrian McKinty

data.quote: I had a teacher in college who drastically changed the course of my life by telling me that he believed in me as an actor. I never received that support before, and it inspired to me to such a degree that I never looked back. He taught me that it's okay to be crappy; it's okay to fight; it's okay to go to any length.
data.author: Taylor Schilling

data.quote: I wanted to be a ballet teacher.
data.author: Jaclyn Smith

data.quote: I had this wonderful career and thought I would retire as a teacher.
data.author: Tim Gunn

data.quote: If you told me when I was a teen that I would end up being a teacher, I would have said you're out of your mind, because quite frankly I hated school.
data.author: Tim Gunn

data.quote: I wanted to be a teacher. I love children, so I wanted to deal with children. Then I wanted to be a veterinarian. But by the age of ten or eleven, when I opened my mouth and said, 'Oh, God, what's this?' I kind of knew teaching and being a veterinarian were gonna have to wait.
data.author: Whitney Houston

data.quote: Muriel, my mother, was my main confidant. She was a teacher of English at Watford grammar school but took a break while my sister Madeleine and I were children. She held court in the kitchen, and we talked about everything.
data.author: John Sulston

data.quote: My history teacher could make us feel like he was imparting rare gossip to us when he was talking about Maria Theresa and the Habsburgs. I just loved that sense of - the Western canon is here, and it's gossipy and tawdry, and everyone is sort of goofy.
data.author: Mallory Ortberg

data.quote: If you are a lousy teacher, you should be fired.
data.author: Geoffrey Canada

data.quote: As places of learning, schools have a responsibility to also educate on nutrition, which we all can agree is far more important than algebra, no matter what your third-period teacher claims.
data.author: Lynda Resnick

data.quote: The wonderful drama teacher at my high school, Barbara Patterson, saw me standing in the hall and told me I should audition for 'West Side Story.' I guess she thought I looked like a gang member.
data.author: Gary Sinise

data.quote: I was never one to go up to someone as a five- or six-year-old and say, 'Hello, my name's Paul, will you be my friend?' But I found if I did an impression of the PE teacher or whatever and people laughed, then they did like me, and so then they started talking to me, rather than me making the initial overture and then maybe being rebuffed.
data.author: Paul Merton

data.quote: You know, I loved math. My mom was a math teacher.
data.author: Joan Cusack

data.quote: A father is a person who's around, participating in a child's life. He's a teacher who helps to guide and shape and mold that young person, someone for that young person to talk to, to share with, their ups and their downs, their fears and their concerns.
data.author: Michael Nutter

data.quote: You know, a football coach is nothing more than a teacher. You teach them the same subject, and you have a group of new guys every year.
data.author: Darrell Royal

data.quote: Every man who rises above the common level has received two educations: the first from his teachers; the second, more personal and important, from himself.
data.author: Edward Gibbon

data.quote: Jesse Jackson is a leader and a teacher who can open our hearts and open our minds and stir our very souls.
data.author: Ann Richards

data.quote: We may have forgotten how to feel. Nobody is teaching us how to live happily ever after, as we've heard in fairy tales.
data.author: Yakov Smirnoff

data.quote: We need to do teacher training to educate them about what temperament means. Shyness is painful and you want to help a child with shyness - but the underlying temperament of being a careful, sensitive person is to be honoured, valued and respected.
data.author: Susan Cain

data.quote: I started elocution lessons because I was being teased, and I had a brilliant drama teacher. At the age of 14, I appeared at the National Theatre in 'The Crucible.'
data.author: Gina Bellman

data.quote: I tried to stir the imagination and enthusiasms of students to take risks, to do what they were most afraid of doing, to widen their horizons of action.
data.author: James Broughton

data.quote: We know the parental support, community support, makes a difference. It's not just the metrics of testing and putting pressure on the schools and on the teachers.
data.author: Donna Shalala

data.quote: I was 20 years old, working as a roofer and a telemarketer and driving a taxi, just barely getting by. A friend of a friend suggested I try acting. I was like, 'Why? What am I going to do? Community theater?' But I took a class, and the teacher thought that I had potential, so I moved to Vancouver and started auditioning.
data.author: Cory Monteith

data.quote: Children are already accustomed to a world that moves faster and is more exciting than anything a teacher in front of a classroom can do.
data.author: Major Owens

data.quote: We can not wait until we have enough trained people willing to work at a teacher's salary and under conditions imposed upon teachers in order to improve what happens in the classroom.
data.author: Major Owens

data.quote: When I was 16, I was taught by a wonderful teacher who let me ignore the Greek syllabus and just read Homer.
data.author: Alice Oswald

data.quote: I have a deal with HBO to develop television, and I am also developing a movie called 'The Abstinence Teacher,' which is based on a book by Tom Perrotta.
data.author: Lisa Cholodenko

data.quote: I've never considered myself a celebrity or even part of the entertainment business. I'm a cooking teacher.
data.author: Martin Yan

data.quote: Once I accomplish one thing and I'm satisfied, I try something else. I may be 50 and doing something totally outside of music and acting. Maybe I'll become a kindergarten teacher.
data.author: Kid Cudi

data.quote: My kindergarten teacher encouraged me to learn, as did my school headmaster, who gave me a grant to study.
data.author: Ada Yonath

data.quote: I initially wanted to be a teacher, and then I was going to become an engineer and build bridges and highways, but pretty soon I went into the business world. I never did get to be a teacher except in a different way.
data.author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

data.quote: As a teacher, my strategy is to encourage questioning. I'm the least authoritarian professor you'll ever meet.
data.author: Niall Ferguson

data.quote: I worked as a secretary, a waitress and a dance teacher - all in high school.
data.author: Jennie Garth

data.quote: You don't want to engage in road rage when the person in the next car might be your child's future teacher or your dentist's father.
data.author: Kim Edwards

data.quote: My mother was told she couldn't go to medical school because she was a woman and a Jew. So she became a teacher in the New York City public school system.
data.author: Marilyn Hacker

data.quote: As a teacher you are more or less obliged to pay the same amount of attention to everything. That can wear you down.
data.author: Marilyn Hacker

data.quote: I think my parents were happy that I'd gone to university and gotten a degree in history so they thought, 'Well if acting doesn't work for him, he can always become a history teacher or something.' Fortunately, the acting worked out.
data.author: Derek Jacobi

data.quote: I want to be involved with young people in some way. Teenagers. Because that's the most vulnerable time. I have a fantasy of becoming a teacher one day.
data.author: Elisabeth Shue

data.quote: My mum is a school teacher and my dad is an electrician.
data.author: Jai Courtney

data.quote: I not only couldn't read but often couldn't hear or understand what was being said to me - by the time I'd processed the beginning of a sentence, the teacher was well on her way through a second or third.
data.author: Philip Schultz

data.quote: As a poet and a teacher, I read all the time. I know I read slowly. I like reading, but I don't read any more than I have to.
data.author: Philip Schultz

data.quote: The first responsibility of the Muslim is as teacher. That is his job, to teach. His first school, his first classroom is within the household. His first student is himself. He masters himself and then he begins to convey the knowledge that he has acquired to the family. The people who are closest to him.
data.author: H. Rap Brown

data.quote: My father is a teacher my mother was a telecom employee. I come from Palermo I was raised in Ethiopia. I am homosexual. I didn't go to film school.
data.author: Luca Guadagnino

data.quote: I don't learn so good, no matter how good the teacher is.
data.author: Warren Zevon

data.quote: My parents always knew that I loved music. They just didn't think I'd try to make it a career. They thought I'd be a painter or an art teacher or something like that.
data.author: Benmont Tench

data.quote: I was the one that was always dancing and got along with everybody, but I also spoke my mind. If I didn't agree with something the teacher would say, I'd tell her, so I would get in trouble for things like that. I've always been a good/bad boy.
data.author: Shameik Moore

data.quote: In business, experience is the big teacher.
data.author: Matthew Stewart

data.quote: As a teacher, as a propagandist, Mr. Shaw is no good at all, even in his own generation. But as a personality, he is immortal.
data.author: Max Beerbohm

data.quote: My favorite English teacher in high school showed me 'Brazil' when I was 15, and it blew my mind. It's one of those movies that's revealed itself in different ways as I've gone back to it over the years.
data.author: Win Butler

data.quote: I don't find acting to be a particularly noble way to make a living. I'm not saving anybody's life, I'm not a teacher, I'm not working for UNICEF. I don't think I'm some big deal.
data.author: Ellen Pompeo

data.quote: My humanitarian work evolved from being with my family. My mom, my dad, they really set a great example for giving back. My mom was a nurse, my dad was a school teacher. But my mom did a lot of things for geriatrics and elderly people. She would do home visits for free.
data.author: Cat Cora

data.quote: I had my heart set on becoming an English teacher, but stumbled into acting after meeting a theatrical agent in my dad's restaurant in San Diego.
data.author: Charisma Carpenter

data.quote: I would take William H. Macy as a teacher any day of the week. He's incredible. He's got a lot of hard-earned experience.
data.author: Skeet Ulrich

data.quote: Dad worked his entire career as an aviation technician. Mom was a legal secretary who became a teacher. We lived a simple American life.
data.author: Brian Sandoval

data.quote: When I left Europe in 1987 I did so with the thought that my relevance as a composition teacher would benefit from a certain cool distance to certain tendencies I had been observing for several years with increasing disquiet.
data.author: Brian Ferneyhough

data.quote: I remember a moment when the Prince went back to his old school, Grammar School in Melbourne, and slightly to his horror his old music teacher produced a cello.
data.author: Anthony Holden

data.quote: I was sent to a nice Church of England girls' school and at that time, after university, a woman was expected to become a teacher, a nurse or a missionary - prior to marriage.
data.author: Kate Adie

data.quote: I grew up in such a musical family, and my dad was the first chair in the Johannesburg Symphony Orchestra, and my mom was a piano teacher and a painter, so it was kind of a creative environment, and it was kind of in my DNA.
data.author: Trevor Rabin

data.quote: I think that when you're queer, you grow up with these kinds of men who might have made you feel small because of who you are. They could be part of your family, or somebody on the street, or a teacher.
data.author: Ben Hopkins

data.quote: I think like a Silicon Valley entrepreneur. Failure is a great teacher. At the same time, you must remember, success will never last... Whether it's tech or fashion, it must be for the customer.
data.author: Tadashi Yanai

data.quote: Catholic schools in our Nation's education have been paramount in teaching the values that we as parents seek to instill in our children.
data.author: Joe Baca

data.quote: I have an education degree from the University of Minnesota, and I was a teacher for about a minute.
data.author: Loni Anderson

data.quote: My parents being Bengali, we always had music in our house. My nani was a trained classical singer, who taught my mum, who, in turn, was my first teacher. Later I would travel almost 70 kms to the nearest town, Kota, to learn music from my guru Mahesh Sharmaji, who was also the principal of the music college there.
data.author: Shreya Ghoshal

data.quote: Literature is my life of course, but from an ontological point of view. From an existential point of view, I like being a teacher.
data.author: Antonio Tabucchi
data.category: Life, My Life, Point Of View

data.quote: No, I'm happy to go on living the life I've chosen. I'm a university teacher and I like my job.
data.author: Antonio Tabucchi

data.quote: My father still is a lawyer, and my mom was a teacher and then later a career counselor.
data.author: Steve Case

data.quote: I had a really creative teacher at primary school. He used to get us doing things such as singing Spandau Ballet in drag in the choir, and I remember loving it.
data.author: Dominic Cooper

data.quote: I was a teacher most of my life, which I loved. I had a very happy working life, and when I retired, I thought I must do something, and I've always read a lot of fiction - you learn so much from fiction. My sentimental education came mostly from fiction, I should say, so I thought I'd try.
data.author: Anita Brookner

data.quote: I'm very involved with kids because after being a teacher for seven years, I just can't stop loving the kids. I am a teacher forever.
data.author: Yolanda Adams

data.quote: The processes of teaching the child that everything cannot be as he wills it are apt to be painful both to him and to his teacher.
data.author: Anne Sullivan

data.quote: A teacher should have maximal authority, and minimal power.
data.author: Thomas Szasz

data.quote: I first started going to shows when I was about 16 - seeing local bands. I mean, I loved music before that, and I played a bit of guitar when I was younger and thought maybe I'd become a guitar teacher or something, but when I saw other kids doing it, I was like, 'Whoa, these are great bands! I can do it, too.'
data.author: Mac DeMarco

data.quote: I went to a Catholic high school and it seemed like every time I drew something for a class project, it either got thrown away by the teacher or something.
data.author: Mike Judge

data.quote: When I was a teacher, teachers would come into my classroom and admire my desk on which lay nothing whatever, whereas theirs were heaped with papers and books.
data.author: Norman MacCaig

data.quote: It was my family that wanted me to be a teacher. That was safe, you see. To be a painter was terrible.
data.author: Josef Albers

data.quote: I had a classic gym teacher in junior high who wore a weightlifter's belt all the time.
data.author: Danny McBride

data.quote: You know, a lot of those angry sort of Southern man characters that I've been doing are based on different people I might've had as, like, a soccer coach or as a teacher.
data.author: Danny McBride

data.quote: I could never have a better teacher in those days than my father.
data.author: Tony Visconti

data.quote: Writing became an obsessive compulsive habit but I had almost no money so I thought about being an urban firefighter and having lots of free time in which to write or becoming an English teacher and thinking about books and writers on a daily basis. That swayed me.
data.author: David Guterson

data.quote: Ask everyone whether they're an actor or a doctor or a teacher or whatever is entitled to his or her opinion. But unfortunately, because actors are in the public eye, whether we want it or not, sometimes our opinions carry more weight or influence than they deserve.
data.author: Debra Messing

data.quote: I feel really good in the teacher role.
data.author: Jimmy Chamberlin

data.quote: My mother wanted to be a teacher when she was young, and my father didn't approve of it, so she fought very hard to become one. And she did it. So when I said I wanted to become an actress, my mother was very supportive. She always said to me, 'There's no such thing as 'can't.'
data.author: Archie Panjabi

data.quote: My mother wanted me to be a teacher. She had this vision of me walking across the quadrangle in an Oxford college wearing my academic gown.
data.author: Simon Callow

data.quote: Data adds concrete information to a teacher's observations and intuition, but it will never replace experience, personal relationships, and cultural understanding.
data.author: Jose Ferreira

data.quote: My high school English teacher in junior year, Dr. Robert Parsons, assigned us some Poe stories, including 'The Black Cat' and 'The Purloined Letter.' Being an animal person, I had trouble with 'The Black Cat!' I got hooked instead by 'The Purloined Letter,' a Poe story with detective C. Auguste Dupin.
data.author: Matthew Pearl

data.quote: It is hardly an exaggeration to say that oral teachers and sign teachers found it difficult to sit down in the same room without quarreling, and there was intolerance upon both sides. To say 'oral method' to a sign teacher was like waving a red flag in the face of a bull, and to say 'sign language' to an oralist aroused the deepest resentment.
data.author: Alexander Graham Bell

data.quote: I wasn't originally taking drama, but the drama teacher asked me to audition for Bye, Bye Birdie. I did and got the lead role. Initially I was kind of scared, but once I did it I got bitten by the bug and loved it.
data.author: Kevin Richardson

data.quote: I wanted to be what my high-school civics and history teacher thought of as a good American. That automatically involved taking an interest in government.
data.author: Olivia De Havilland

data.quote: I feel so very grateful to have the voice God gave me. It takes a lot of rest and training to sing, and I was lucky that I found a great teacher when I first moved to New York.
data.author: Judy Collins

data.quote: My mother was a first-grade teacher, so I credit her with this lifelong intellectual curiosity I have, and love of reading and learning.
data.author: Chesley Sullenberger

data.quote: I remember the mentoring experiences of some teachers that I had, like a second term home room teacher in public school that really was very helpful to me.
data.author: Sanford I. Weill

data.quote: My first career was as a coach and a teacher.
data.author: David Friedman

data.quote: There happened to be guitar classes at the college, and there was a guitar teacher there with whom I used to play. In addition, I also would go out into country schools and teach little kids basic guitar and singing a few times a week.
data.author: Mark Knopfler

data.quote: When I was child, I never spoke. Teacher used to write remarks on my note book. My mom sent me to a trainer. I started talking, and it gave me confidence.
data.author: Boman Irani

data.quote: Southern people are raised with a work ethic. My son is 5 years old and does chores. My mom was a dance teacher, and the training and discipline it takes to be a dancer I've carried with me in Hollywood.
data.author: Jaime Pressly

data.quote: In acting class, I used to hide in the corner and pray the teacher wouldn't call on me.
data.author: Peggy Lipton

data.quote: Whether you're an obstetrician or a third-grade teacher or a real estate agent, you know when you're doing good work. You're passionate about it.
data.author: Susan Isaacs

data.quote: Any writing teacher tells you to write what you know, and for better or for worse, Washington is a world I know well.
data.author: Kristin Gore

data.quote: I'd like to say I was smart enough to finish six grades in five years, but I think perhaps the teacher was just glad to get rid of me.
data.author: Alan Shepard

data.quote: I went to a school called Tring Park School for the Performing Arts. I went because initially I was very naughty, and my mom thought if I was busy, I'd be better. And I didn't really do acting until later on in the school, with an amazing teacher. I left, went traveling, came back.
data.author: Daisy Ridley

data.quote: If you ask me about vocal technique, I don't know anything. I could never be a teacher. I just know what my teacher told me: 'Always sing with a full voice. When they tell you, less sound, more piano - no.'
data.author: Anna Netrebko

data.quote: No matter how much you like your local school teacher, he or she is a government agent.
data.author: Nancy Pearcey

data.quote: A woman of faith is fearless. There is no ambiguity, no uncertain trump in her life. She can live a principled life because she studies the doctrine and teachings of a perfect teacher, the Master. She is a noble example to all who know her.
data.author: Margaret D. Nadauld

data.quote: When I started writing full time I had not long stopped being a teacher and when at last I had a full day to write, I would put music on and wonder to myself - am I allowed to do this? Then I thought: 'I am control of this and no one is telling me what I can do.'
data.author: Roddy Doyle

data.quote: My history teacher was utterly terrifying, but her lessons were very inspiring. She got me interested in people and stories, which then led me to acting.
data.author: Laura Carmichael

data.quote: A mentor, a 'teacher,' is like an editor. I absolutely value my editor, who is my teacher.
data.author: David Bergen

data.quote: My parents wanted me to be a teacher. Because I could work most of the year and pursue the things that I love to do during the summer. It just seemed like a good plan.
data.author: Kate Micucci

data.quote: I was on Oprah's show recently talking about the people who impacted me the most. One was a teacher and one was my soccer coach. I didn't even go into my family, who had the most influence.
data.author: Andrew Shue

data.quote: The fact of the matter is that when there are feelings involved and you like someone, it doesn't matter if you're an actor, a teacher, a doctor, a lawyer, a receptionist - you can't really help it when you have feelings for someone.
data.author: Jessica Szohr

data.quote: I learned Hebrew from a high school teacher named Mr. Cohen. We would drive down the highway to meet his car, and Jewish boys from these Massachusetts towns would sit in his car and learn the lessons.
data.author: Israel Horovitz

data.quote: In high school, my English teacher Celeste McMenamin introduced me to the great novels and Shakespeare and taught me how to write. Essays, poetry, critical analysis. Writing is a skill that was painful then but a love of mine now.
data.author: Aaron Lazar

data.quote: Christine Bass was my high school music teacher. She took a program on its last legs and within a few years turned into one of the best programs in the country. Our high school dominated national choir competitions all through her 20-plus year tenure.
data.author: Aaron Lazar

data.quote: A wonderful acting teacher I love, Josh Pais, has a system I love for being in the moment in acting, but also in life. And one of the things he reminds me of is to take a moment and just be here now.
data.author: Alysia Reiner

data.quote: I guess by taking lessons early on, and really trying to play all the rudimentary stuff, and try to have it sound as good as my teacher. It took a lot of practice, which I enjoyed, and still do.
data.author: Matt Cameron

data.quote: I decided at age 9, but I was reinforced at age 13 when a teacher told me I had talent. I can't say she really motivated me because I already knew. I knew I had talent. I went to the Jewish community theater and got in plays there. Then I went for the movies.'
data.author: Richard Dreyfuss

data.quote: If I wasn't an actor, I'd be a teacher, a history teacher. After all, teaching is very much like performing. A teacher is an actor, in a way. It takes a great deal to get, and hold, a class.
data.author: Richard Dreyfuss

data.quote: My dad remembers being in school with my uncle, and the teacher would say outright to the class that the Japanese were second-class citizens and shouldn't be trusted.
data.author: Mike Shinoda

data.quote: I never did very well in math - I could never seem to persuade the teacher that I hadn't meant my answers literally.
data.author: Calvin Trillin

data.quote: My father was a teacher, and there were teachers all around, his friends, they were working for the Government and their behaviour was within strictly limited areas.
data.author: C. L. R. James

data.quote: I see myself as an old man and an unqualified teacher to the nation. I think being a teacher is probably the most important thing you can be in politics.
data.author: Tony Benn

data.quote: The Spirit of the Holy Ghost is the teacher in the temple. He teaches principles of eternal significance. It is during these instructions that we see the relationship between the earthly and the eternal. We must remember that the Spirit teaches only those who are teachable.
data.author: L. Lionel Kendrick

data.quote: I wanted to be a teacher, but I was a lousy student, one of the slowest readers. It was a tremendous struggle. But I'm lucky I had some teachers who saw something in me.
data.author: Ann Bancroft

data.quote: A great teacher who is full of excitement and love for her students can make all the difference in their lives.
data.author: Deval Patrick

data.quote: I first decided to become an actor at school. A teacher gave us a play to do and that had a major impact. At first, I wanted to work in the theatre, but there was something about the ambience of film, especially American films, that always attracted me.
data.author: Jean Reno

data.quote: I know I have this kind of teaching element in me, but I don't want to become a 'teacher of theater' because that would formalize something that I'd much rather keep casual.
data.author: Richard Griffiths

data.quote: My most memorable teacher was Rich Campe, my third-grade teacher at Fairlands Elementary in Pleasanton, California.
data.author: Deb Caletti

data.quote: I had a ninth grade teacher who told me I was much smarter and much better than I was allowing myself to be.
data.author: Scott Hamilton

data.quote: I wanted to be an endurance athlete from a young age. I remember being in a careers class at school and saying I wanted to be a professional athlete and the teacher replying, 'You're not going to make it; it's not possible.'
data.author: Alistair Brownlee

data.quote: Mike Watt and I had the same teacher. Mr. Tanaka.
data.author: Krist Novoselic

data.quote: Find a good teacher, as I found for my sons. I feel the worst thing you can do is to try and teach your own children yourself, because there is a natural rebellion that occurs.
data.author: Keith Emerson

data.quote: My father's a preacher, my mother's a teacher, thus I rhyme.
data.author: Saul Williams

data.quote: I was a theater dork in high school and did all the plays. My theater teacher in high school, Janet Spahr, was absolutely incredible and mentored me throughout school. She taught me a lot about relying on my instincts.
data.author: Melissa Rauch

data.quote: My first acting job happened by accident when I was really young. I was in fifth grade and my teacher saw an ad in the paper and took me to the audition after school and I got the part.
data.author: Ajay Naidu

data.quote: I started the class late. The teacher said I would have to learn as much in half a year that the others learned in a year. I did it.
data.author: Katarina Witt

data.quote: I remember I used to come up to my teacher crying because I couldn't read. She would say: 'You can do this. You just don't want to do this.'
data.author: Max Brooks

data.quote: I was 11 when a teacher suggested to my parents that they should send me to drama classes to curb my disruptive ways in the classroom. The next Saturday I was acting, and thereafter it became a ritual of my youth to see a show at the Belvoir on Sundays and, if I was lucky, another at the Opera House on Monday after school.
data.author: David Wenham

data.quote: My very beloved and deceased third-grade teacher, Cliff Kehod, was the one that I really remember calling me Ike a lot. It just stuck. It is a dog's name, but I love dogs.
data.author: Ike Barinholtz

data.quote: Sincerity is the norm of Heaven and the law of our nature. China and the West agree on this point, for without sincerity, no human prince could ever found a state, and no earthly teacher could ever establish a religion.
data.author: Zhang Zhidong

data.quote: Raphael Saadiq said to me, quite often, that Chuck D was his history teacher. And so he got a lot from the music, things that he wasn't getting maybe in school. And I feel the same way with regards to Earth, Wind & Fire, Stevie Wonder.

data.quote: Given my age, I am pretty near the end, probably, of my career as a writer, a scholar, a teacher. And I wanted to speak of things I will not be able to do.
data.author: George Steiner

data.quote: I learned early on that 'rabbi' means teacher, not priest.
data.author: George Steiner

data.quote: 'Rabbi' means 'teacher,' and I see the role of chief rabbi as chief teacher.
data.author: Ephraim Mirvis

data.quote: People can look to me as a teacher, but I consider myself a student of hip-hop.
data.author: Doug E. Fresh

data.quote: I delight sometimes in saying to - as when I'm a teacher, I love saying, 'This is really important, so don't write it down.' To me, what you retain is a very important filter.
data.author: Robert Pinsky

data.quote: I thought I'd grow up to be a teacher, or maybe run for political office.
data.author: Jake Shimabukuro

data.quote: Teacher compensation isn't the only factor in cultivating great teaching. Other important priorities include changing how we measure student performance, providing more flexibility to teacher-preparation programs, and improving how we train and support principals.
data.author: Michael Bennet

data.quote: My time at the Denver Public Schools taught me there is no harder, or more important, job than being a teacher.
data.author: Michael Bennet

data.quote: I believe there's not a harder job in the world than being a teacher, and there isn't a job with a more direct impact on the performance of our students.
data.author: Michael Bennet

data.quote: There is a shortage of teachers but the January 2001 schools census showed that teacher numbers were at their highest level than at any time since 1984 - and 11,000 higher than 1997.
data.author: Estelle Morris

data.quote: My father followed, during most of his life, the precarious occupation of a country school teacher.
data.author: Simon Newcomb

data.quote: What we now call school training, the pursuit of fixed studies at stated hours under the constant guidance of a teacher, I could scarcely be said to have enjoyed.
data.author: Simon Newcomb

data.quote: How well I walk my talk, and not talk my talk, determines the quality of my engagement, of all my experience with what is quite personally my God. I'm my greatest teacher, and within me, I have the power to push myself deeper and higher.
data.author: Lorraine Toussaint

data.quote: There was an email forwarded to me from a first-grade teacher, and she said she was teaching them civil rights for MLK weekend, and a little first-grader stood up, and he said, 'I can explain segregation,' and proceeded to explain all the scenes from 'Hidden Figures.' And I died because that's everything.
data.author: Allison Schroeder

data.quote: I was an elementary school teacher.
data.author: Luciano Pavarotti

data.quote: While I was in India, my yoga teacher asked me to start teaching, and my life became about that for years. I taught 18 classes a week, therapeutics, and traveled to study with other teachers.

data.quote: One of the most extraordinary things about being a spiritual teacher is the rare privilege of being able to look deeply into the very souls of many human beings at the same time.
data.author: Andrew Cohen

data.quote: My mother was a P.E. teacher, and she was kind of a fanatic about fitness and nutrition growing up, so it was ingrained in me at a young age. As I get older, I'm finding out it's not about getting all buffed up and looking good. It's more about staying healthy and flexible.
data.author: Josh Duhamel

data.quote: I always wanted to be a teacher. I went to school to be a teacher. And I've always, you know, had this sort of romantic idea about it. But I'm worried about - I'm worried about education.

data.quote: I'm very grateful and fully aware that 90 percent of actors are not working. Going from public school teacher to a show like 'Grey's Anatomy', I love what I do.
data.author: Jesse Williams

data.quote: What happened is, when I was doing 'Taxi,' the last year, we did this thing where we had on top hats and tails, and we pretended to tap-dance. And I said to myself, 'You know, I always wanted to know how to do this.' So I got myself a teacher, and I started studying, and I got hooked.
data.author: Tony Danza

data.quote: The second, and I think this is the much more overt and I think it is the main cause, I have been increasingly demonstrating or trying to demonstrate that every possible stance a critic, a scholar, a teacher can take towards a poem is itself inevitably and necessarily poetic.
data.author: Harold Bloom

data.quote: I think that school just isn't for everyone. A lot of people don't learn well when they're - have to sit in a place for eight hours. A lot of people learn best lying in their own bed, teaching themselves from books. And I was a bad student. I was a brat. If I was a teacher, I would not have liked myself.
data.author: Molly Crabapple

data.quote: It was difficult being a teacher and out of the closet in the '50s. By the time I retired, the English department was proud of having a gay poet of a certain minor fame. It was a very satisfactory change!
data.author: Thom Gunn

data.quote: My old teacher's definition of poetry is an attempt to understand.
data.author: Thom Gunn

data.quote: The office of the public teacher is an unenviable and thankless one.
data.author: Felix Adler

data.quote: I was going to get a degree in economics and be a teacher. But I couldn't afford to pay for the education. So I just got the MBA and not the doctorate. I loved it at Bain, and I've been there ever since.
data.author: Stephen Pagliuca

data.quote: Instead of being a teacher, I got a job with a company called Bain & Co., consulting firm, and they taught me how to build businesses.
data.author: Stephen Pagliuca

data.quote: My sister is an ER doctor, and my brother is a teacher.
data.author: Rami Malek

data.quote: In my teens, I developed a passionate idolatry for a teacher of English literature. I wanted to do something that he would approve of more, so I thought I should be some sort of a scholar.

data.quote: I never thought, 'Oh God, I'm in Prince's shadow.' He'd been performing for years, and he was my teacher.

data.quote: Some of my high school teachers did remind me that I had an excellent imagination when it came to making up excuses.
data.author: David E. Kelley

data.quote: I was a teacher for a long time. I taught at a community college: voice, theory, humanities. And nowadays, music education is a dying thing. Funding is being cut more and more and more.
data.author: Jon Secada

data.quote: I love doing demonstrations. I think to be a great chef you have to be a great teacher. I love doing classes with people who love food and enjoy food, bringing them all around one table so to speak.

data.quote: I've always written. When I was in school, the only teacher who ever liked me was my creative writing teacher. I used to enter poetry competitions, and I don't think I ever lost one. So I had the idea for a while of being some kind of poet.

data.quote: When I was writing 'The Abstinence Teacher,' I really tried to immerse myself in contemporary American evangelical culture.
data.author: Tom Perrotta

data.quote: Whether you're working in corporate America or you're a journalist, construction worker, a teacher or an actor - we're all trying to keep working. If one job is ending, you look for another job. When 'Psych' ends, I will be looking for another job.
data.author: Dule Hill

data.quote: In the balance of my professional life, I've had the privilege of the working as a practicing lawyer and teacher.
data.author: Neil Gorsuch

data.quote: When I was 16, I played Macbeth at school and my English teacher said, 'I think you may have acting talent. Try to get into the National Youth Theatre of Great Britain and see where you get.' I wouldn't have thought of that at all. I wanted to be a surgeon, but I wasn't a clever man.

data.quote: Teachers believe they have a gift for giving it drives them with the same irrepressible drive that drives others to create a work of art or a market or a building.
data.author: A. Bartlett Giamatti

data.quote: I had a great drama teacher, and he sort of made out drama school as this incredibly difficult thing to get into: 6,000 people apply every year, and some of the schools only have 12 places. It's a phenomenally difficult thing to get into. And that excited me - I wanted that challenge.

data.quote: But I think that any young drummer starting out today should get himself a great teacher and learn all there is to know about the instrument that he wants to play.

data.quote: Then I heard this genius teacher Stella Adler - I recommend you read anything you might find about her and if you have anyone interested in theatre, you get them one of her books.

data.quote: I had an art teacher who's the reason I got there in high school who encouraged me to go to Alabama. That's where she had gone and kept raving over their art department.

data.quote: The message of music was also the first thing what I learned from my first teacher. She was an organist too and she was very devoted to what she played, so she had a respect for every piece and she felt that she is not allowed to add something of her own.

data.quote: I remember my fourth grade teacher reading 'Charlotte's Web' and 'Stuart Little' to us - both, of course, by E. B. White. His stories were genuinely funny, thought provoking and full of irony and charm. He didn't condescend to his readers, which was why I liked his books, and why I wasn't a big reader of other children's' books.
data.author: Louis Sachar

data.quote: Delayed gratification is a sweet lesson whose teacher knows the best is not right now, it is yet to be.
data.author: Maximillian Degenerez

data.quote: What it takes is to actually write: not to think about it, not to imagine it, not to talk about it, but to actually want to sit down and write. I'm lucky I learned that habit a really long time ago. I credit my mother with that. She was an English teacher, but she was a writer.
data.author: Luanne Rice

data.quote: As a teacher myself I've been in situations where parents come at you, and sometimes parents come across like the teacher doesn't want the best for their kid and it can be really, really hurtful.

data.quote: Openness is something any teacher strives to instill in his or her students.
data.author: Chris Raschka

data.quote: To learn to ride a bicycle, as with the other great noble human inventions, is a hugely complex activity. Generally, it requires three things: the learner, the teacher and the bicycle, all in the same place at the same time, most often outside someplace.
data.author: Chris Raschka

data.quote: Instead of five hundred thousand average algebra teachers, we need one good algebra teacher. We need that teacher to create software, videotape themselves, answer questions, let your computer or the iPad teach algebra... The hallmark of any good technology is that it destroys jobs.

data.quote: I like to be loved by my children, and I quite like the 'Guardian' hating me. I like it when I read they want me to die painfully. Then I think I've really got under their skin. It's like annoying a teacher. Once they've shown signs of weakness, you really can go for them.

data.quote: My duty as a teacher is to train, educate future programmers.
data.author: Niklaus Wirth

data.quote: I was chubby in high school. I used to go to my information technology class, and I would type really fast to get the lesson done quick because the teacher had a little acoustic guitar, and there was a girl I had a crush on in the class. I would take the guitar and pretend to be some great singer-songwriter, serenade her with joke songs.

data.quote: Teachers have told us across the country that what's severely outdated is the teacher at the front of the classroom as the font of knowledge, because as we know, access to knowledge and information is now ubiquitous. So instead, teachers want to help students learn how to think so that they can be lifelong learners.
data.author: Laurene Powell Jobs

data.quote: I had a teacher, he was 86 years old and his name was Luigi in New York City, and he said, 'Never stop moving. You get to reinvent yourself.' So you have to find ways to reinventing yourself. Especially today, because it's a whole different market - social media is so important.

data.quote: As a student I learned from wonderful teachers and ever since then I've thought everyone is a teacher.

data.quote: You know how to tell if the teacher is hung over? Movie Day.

data.quote: I always wrote music for my friends, but my focus was on playing piano. I didn't think I'd be quite good enough to be a soloist, but I believed that if I worked hard enough, I could work as a player, a teacher.

data.quote: Everybody's a teacher if you listen.

data.quote: A friend of mine said, no matter what I do I always look like an English teacher. She actually said, you still look like a Campbell's Soup kid.

data.quote: Writing, I'm convinced, should be a subversive activity - frowned on by the authorities - and not one cooed over and praised beyond common sense by some teacher.

data.quote: Yes, I was actually an acting teacher for a while.

data.quote: In high school, a teacher's friend in the police department asked me to go into a bar and flash a fake ID saying I was 21 even though I wasn't. They were assuming the bar wasn't carding people. Anyway, she forgot to ask for it back. I used it all freshman year in college.

data.quote: I can't explain something I saw on holiday on Holy Island when I was about nine years old, but do you know what, it could have been my PE teacher dressed in a monk's habit. I have no idea. I'm not a ghost person... it doesn't mean there aren't unexplained things; I just don't think they're ghosts.

data.quote: I have taught some master classes and things at my alma mater and sometimes at my kids' school. I will go in and talk to the theater students. I wouldn't really call myself a teacher.

data.quote: I had one of those defining moments in the fourth grade when my teacher said the story I wrote was the best in the class, and therefore I would be going Young Authors Conference where I'd get to hang out with authors all day.

data.quote: I grew up in Rome, in actually what I would say was a liberal, open-minded family. My father was an architect and my mother was a teacher of art history, so it was sort of intellectual, and maybe a bit much for me when I was a child.

data.quote: Dad is in commercial real estate. Mom is a writer and a retired teacher.

data.quote: I had a high school English teacher who made me really work at writing. And once, when I got an assignment back, she'd written: 'This is so good, Andrew. This should be published!' That made a big impression on me.

data.quote: I still remember asking my high school guidance teacher for permission to take a second year of algebra instead of a fifth year of Latin. She looked down her nose at me and sneered, 'What lady would take mathematics instead of Latin?'

data.quote: My mother was a teacher. She was grooming my brother and me to be successful, accomplished people.

data.quote: In many ways, 'What Teachers Make: In Praise of the Greatest Job in the World' is just one big thank-you note to my teachers. The book is dedicated to my fifth and sixth grade English teacher, Dr. Joseph D'Angelo, a massive force of erudition, martial artistry, culture, and love.

data.quote: One of the things I've always liked about my husband is he's very good at lots of stuff. He was an English teacher when I met him. He wrote poetry and played the guitar. As time went on, he decided to go into economics, so he's very analytical and mathematical in addition to his artsy side.

data.quote: There is no teacher, living or past, who can give us the actual understanding of Truth. A teacher can only put our feet upon the path and point the way. That is all. It is wholly dependent on the individual to make his way to Truth.

data.quote: Smartness runs in my family. When I went to school I was so smart my teacher was in my class for five years.

data.author: Elizabeth Hardwick

data.quote: In a home school, the kid does 95% of the work. But in a school system, since it's an indoctrination system, a teacher has to do 95% of the work.

data.quote: Who am I? I'm a man, an American, a father, a teacher, but most of all, I am a person who knows how the arts can change lives, because they transformed mine. I was a dancer.

data.author: Grazia Deledda

data.quote: Evil can be a teacher, if you look at the wisdom of its negative power.
data.author: Tom Brown, Jr.

data.quote: A teacher is never too smart to learn from his pupils. But while runners differ, basic principles never change. So it's a matter of fitting your current practices to fit the event and the individual. See, what's good for you might not be worth a darn for the next guy.
data.author: Bill Bowerman

data.quote: When I was 14 or 15, our teacher introduced us to Dickens' 'A Tale of Two Cities.' It was just for entertainment - we read it aloud - and all of a sudden it became a treasure.
data.author: Dermot Healy

data.quote: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: A mother's arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them.
data.author: Victor Hugo

data.quote: Mother is the name for God in the lips and hearts of little children.
data.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

data.quote: Children are the anchors that hold a mother to life.
data.author: Sophocles

data.quote: Life began with waking up and loving my mother's face.
data.author: George Eliot

data.quote: My mom is definitely my rock.
data.author: Alicia Keys

data.quote: I was always at peace because of the way my mom treated me.
data.author: Martina Hingis

data.quote: It may be possible to gild pure gold, but who can make his mother more beautiful?

data.quote: A mother's happiness is like a beacon, lighting up the future but reflected also on the past in the guise of fond memories.

data.quote: The love of a mother is the veil of a softer light between the heart and the heavenly Father.
data.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

data.quote: There is nothing in the world of art like the songs mother used to sing.
data.author: Billy Sunday

data.quote: My mother is a walking miracle.
data.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

data.quote: Motherhood is... difficult and... rewarding.
data.author: Gloria Estefan

data.quote: For when a child is born the mother also is born again.
data.author: Gilbert Parker

data.quote: The babe at first feeds upon the mother's bosom, but it is always on her heart.
data.author: Henry Ward Beecher

data.quote: I got to grow up with a mother who taught me to believe in me.
data.author: Antonio Villaraigosa

data.quote: With what price we pay for the glory of motherhood.
data.author: Isadora Duncan

data.quote: Who's a boy gonna talk to if not his mother?
data.author: Donald E. Westlake

data.quote: When my mother had to get dinner for 8 she'd just make enough for 16 and only serve half.
data.author: Gracie Allen

data.quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
data.author: Carrie Underwood

data.quote: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness, immobilized by the gravity of my loss, or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have - life itself.
data.author: Walter Anderson

data.quote: It's time to say goodbye, but I think goodbyes are sad and I'd much rather say hello. Hello to a new adventure.
data.author: Ernie Harwell

data.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
data.author: Denis Waitley

data.quote: To help yourself, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake, learn from it, pick yourself up and move on.
data.author: Dave Pelzer

data.quote: I think it's important to have closure in any relationship that ends - from a romantic relationship to a friendship. You should always have a sense of clarity at the end and know why it began and why it ended. You need that in your life to move cleanly into your next phase.
data.author: Jennifer Aniston

data.quote: If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment.
data.author: Carlos Santana

data.quote: Only the broken-hearted know the truth about love.
data.author: Mason Cooley

data.quote: Blessed are the hearts that can bend they shall never be broken.
data.author: Albert Camus

data.quote: Moving on, is a simple thing, what it leaves behind is hard.
data.author: Dave Mustaine

data.quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: My life is about ups and downs, great joys and great losses.
data.author: Isabel Allende

data.quote: Healing yourself is connected with healing others.
data.author: Yoko Ono

data.quote: Feeling sorry for ourselves is the most useless waste of energy on the planet. It does absolutely no good. We can't let our circumstances or what others do or don't do control us. We can decide to be happy regardless.
data.author: Joyce Meyer

data.quote: Forget the past.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: We all have life storms, and when we get the rough times and we recover from them, we should celebrate that we got through it. No matter how bad it may seem, there's always something beautiful that you can find.
data.author: Mattie Stepanek

data.quote: I've been heartbroken. I've broken hearts. That's part of life, and its part of figuring out who you are so you can find the right partner.
data.author: Heidi Klum

data.quote: A man never knows how to say goodbye a woman never knows when to say it.
data.author: Helen Rowland

data.quote: The world is a crazy, beautiful, ugly complicated place, and it keeps moving on from crisis to strangeness to beauty to weirdness to tragedy. The caravan keeps moving on, and the job of the longform writer or filmmaker or radio broadcaster is to stop - is to pause - and when the caravan goes away, that's when this stuff comes.
data.author: David Remnick

data.quote: Forget the past - the future will give you plenty to worry about.
data.author: George Allen, Sr.

data.quote: I think faith is incredibly important because you will become overwhelmed with what's happening and you will have waves of grief, but when you turn to your faith, I believe God will give you waves of grace to get through it.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: Part of the healing process is sharing with other people who care.
data.author: Jerry Cantrell

data.quote: It is by going down into the abyss that we recover the treasures of life. Where you stumble, there lies your treasure.
data.author: Joseph Campbell

data.quote: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.
data.author: Tori Amos

data.quote: The heart will break, but broken live on.
data.author: Lord Byron

data.quote: Recovery begins from the darkest moment.
data.author: John Major

data.quote: I think hearts are very much like glasses. If they do not break with the first ring, they usually last a considerable time.
data.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

data.quote: Never despair, but if you do, work on in despair.
data.author: Edmund Burke

data.quote: The Real is ever-present, like the screen on which the cinematographic pictures move. While the picture appears on it, the screen remains invisible. Stop the picture, and the screen will become clear. All thoughts and events are merely pictures moving on the screen of Pure Consciousness, which alone is real.
data.author: Ramana Maharshi

data.quote: We are healed from suffering only by experiencing it to the full.
data.author: Marcel Proust

data.quote: Transformation in the world happens when people are healed and start investing in other people.
data.author: Michael W. Smith

data.quote: Expect trouble as an inevitable part of life and repeat to yourself, the most comforting words of all; this, too, shall pass.
data.author: Ann Landers

data.quote: The willow which bends to the tempest, often escapes better than the oak which resists it; and so in great calamities, it sometimes happens that light and frivolous spirits recover their elasticity and presence of mind sooner than those of a loftier character.
data.author: Albert Schweitzer

data.quote: The goal of spiritual practice is full recovery, and the only thing you need to recover from is a fractured sense of self.
data.author: Marianne Williamson

data.quote: Moving on is not closure. It's not neat, and it's not about turning the page. It is about moving on, but it doesn't mean that you've left something behind.

data.quote: Women have seldom sufficient employment to silence their feelings; a round of little cares, or vain pursuits frittering away all strength of mind and organs, they become naturally only objects of sense.

data.quote: Don't be intimidated by what you don't know. That can be your greatest strength and ensure that you do things differently from everyone else.

data.quote: Strengths are not activities you're good at, they're activities that strengthen you. data.quote: Anyone can wear my dresses. They will look good on any figure, no matter what shape you are. I want to celebrate a woman's inner strength, to inspire real women and make them feel confident and beautiful.

data.quote: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.

data.quote: I think that we should remember that social change can happen when people join together with some strength.

data.quote: I know that, like every woman of the people, I have more strength than I appear to have.

data.quote: He knows not his own strength who hath not met adversity.

data.quote: I think the key to beautiful, frizz-free curls in the summer is to keep hair healthy. data.quote: I have behind me not only the splendid traditions and the annals of more than a thousand years but the living strength and majesty of the Commonwealth and Empire; of societies old and new; of lands and races different in history and origins but all, by God's Will, united in spirit and in aim.

data.quote: Families are the tie that reminds us of yesterday, provide strength and support today, and give us hope for tomorrow. No government, no matter how well-intentioned, or well-managed, can provide what our families provide.

data.quote: I've been through it all, baby, I'm mother courage.

data.quote: I'm very sensitive about the fact that there's not a lot of good work for women in cinema that also deals with strong characters. data.quote: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance.

data.quote: I always say the strength of democracy lies in criticism. If there is no criticism, that means there is no democracy. And if you want to grow, you must invite criticism. And I want to grow; I want to invite criticism.

data.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

data.quote: For me, the perfect romantic suspense hero has got to be tough on the outside but tender at his core. I mean, he might bend the law if he thinks the ends justify the means.

data.quote: It took me a really long time to decide who I want my circle to be and who I want to surround myself with. Once you make that choice, that is where I feel like I have built my strength. data.quote: The days of our lives, for all of us, are numbered. We know that. And yes, there are certainly times when we aren't able to muster as much strength and patience as we would like. It's called being human.

data.quote: We get strength and encouragement from watching children.

data.quote: I have a theory and I really believe it. I think your worst weakness can become your greatest single strength.

data.quote: God will give us the strength to be able to handle things. I mean, you can try to do it on your own, and sometimes you can pull off some stuff, but in the long run, it's much easier with Him by our side.

data.quote: Before I was married to Martin and became a King, I was a proud Scott, shaped by my mother's discernment and my father's strength.

data.quote: The strength of the nation ultimately depends upon the strength of family and community.

data.quote: We - we need strength, we need energy, we need quickness and we need brain in this country to turn it around.

data.quote: Living in America and, of course, just being women in general, we've got more strength than we think we do.
data.author: Dolly Parton

data.quote: The fact that people in Hollywood are open to what I teach is not because they're more desperate than anyone else, but because they're more touched by it. That's not their weakness. It's their strength!

data.quote: If we resist our passions, it is more due to their weakness than our strength.

data.quote: I do believe that we are to love our enemies and do good to those who persecute you. I believe that there is power and strength in that.

data.quote: With a book, you're guaranteed the audience has a certain skill level and that the audience has to make an ongoing effort to consume this product and that the project is being consumed by just one person at a time. I really want to play to that strength because it's one of the few advantages books still have.

data.quote: Strength and compassion are not mutually exclusive.

data.quote: 'Peace through Strength' only works if you have and show strength.

data.quote: When you have a fresh point of view that comes from the right side of the heart, it's just so valuable. You can take it or not take it, but just that perspective can give you a lot of strength or make you reflect on a lot of things.

data.quote: The strength of our economy allows us to maintain the mightiest military in the world, effectively enforcing a Pax Americana.
data.author: Ted Cruz

data.quote: What I've learned is that unless it's an emergency, like a fire or brain surgery, hierarchy is not necessary and may be damaging. If you have a hierarchy, you're repeating the strengths and weaknesses of one person without allowing for the accumulative strength of a group.

data.quote: To love God with all your heart, soul, mind, and strength is all-consuming and all-encompassing. It is no lukewarm endeavor.

data.quote: Thinking differently is my strength.
data.author: Carine Roitfeld

data.quote: The earliest paintings I loved were always the most non-referential paintings you can imagine, by painters such as Mondrian. data.author: Brian Eno

data.quote: The transfer of power is always a test of the constitutional system, a test of its strength.
data.author: Vladimir Putin

data.quote: Jews are known for many things, but strength, swiftness, and agility are not among them. There is one trait, as controversial as it is familiar, for which Jews are above all known, and that is shrewdness in business.

data.quote: In America we have a Declaration of Independence, but our history, our advancements, our global strength all point to an American declaration of interdependence.

data.quote: I'm used to very strong women because my mother was particularly strong, and my father was away all the time. My mother was a big part of bringing up three boys, so I was fully versed in the strength of a powerful woman, and accepted that as the status quo.

data.quote: On 'Saturday Night Live,' I never really wrote. You know, I would just - I would let the writers cast me into the show. So my strength - and I put all my energies into performance. I just couldn't deal with the rejection, you know, getting your sketches cut, and it was hard for me.

data.quote: Strength of will is the test of a young man's possibilities. Can he will strong enough and hold whatever he undertakes with an iron grip?

data.quote: My father not only has the strength and ability necessary to be our next president, but also the kindness and compassion that will enable him to be the leader that this country needs.

data.quote: For my first fragrance, I wanted to capture the essence of a woman's strength and beauty.
data.author: Ivanka Trump

data.quote: Many a man's strength is in opposition, and when he faileth, he grows out of use.

data.quote: You can tell the strength of a nation by the women behind its men.

data.quote: The Green Lantern is a unique superhero because it's not that he's super that is his focus it's that he's a man. He's very human. That's his greatest strength and his greatest weakness.

data.quote: Organized religion is a sham and a crutch for weak-minded people who need strength in numbers. It tells people to go out and stick their noses in other people's business.

data.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

data.quote: I sort of consider myself a comedic actress, not a comedienne. I think it's different. You know, I'm not a stand-up or anything, but playing into comedic situations is sort of where, I think, my strength lies.
